import Example from './../../../../guideline-app/app/ui/components/example/Example';
import PopoverNormalEksempel from '../_popover.example.js';
import Popover, { PopoverBase } from './..';

## Normal

<Example>
    <PopoverNormalEksempel />
</Example>

```jsx
<Knapp onClick={(e) => this.togglePopover(e.currentTarget)}>Ã…pne popover</Knapp>
<Popover
    ankerEl={this.state.anker}
    apen={this.state.anker !== undefined}
    onClose={() => this.setState({anker: undefined})}
>
    <p style={{padding:'1rem'}}>
        Dette er en popover.
    </p>
</Popover>
```
